channel.title: Shop Errors
channel.description:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,235947.0.html ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ Tutorial That I Used| -------------------------
The things I did.
Shops.cfg : shop = 66 Random Item Shop 2 2 5574 100 5575 100 5576 100 14023 100
Autospawn.cfg: spawn = 636 3189 3961 0 0 0 0 0 1 Cheerleader
Client.Java: } else if (NPCID == 636) { // Cheerleader PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 66; // Random Item Shop[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 28, 2008, 08:35:04 PM[/size][hr] Was the error.[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "6 36 3189 3961" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1830) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:23) at server.main(server.java:33) - Slipknot Scape - .. Online! You can now log in! [/code]

Tutorial That I Used

The things I did.

Shops.cfg :
shop = 66 Random Item Shop 2 2 5574 100 5575 100 5576 100 14023 100

Autospawn.cfg:
spawn = 636 3189 3961 0 0 0 0 0 1 Cheerleader

Client.Java:
}
else if (NPCID == 636) { // Cheerleader
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 66; // Random Item Shop[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 28, 2008, 08:35:04 PM[/size][hr] Was the error.[code]Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: “6
